summary: fscache: Use wait_on_bit() to wait for the freeing of relinquished volume
details:
fscache: Use wait_on_bit() to wait for the freeing of relinquished volume

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.11 by commit 3be069f42a7b79d3149194f21cdf24bf23864cac, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 62ab63352350e881ae693a8236b35d7d0516c78b. For more details please see the references link.
